item.title: PEP 0498: Literal String Interpolation
item.description: Being an awesome text manipulation language as it is, Python has quite a few ways to interpolate strings. Some of them can be seen below: %-formatting word = "awesome" print("This place is %s, isn't it?" % word) # This place is awesome, isn't it? str.format() word = "awesome" print("Python is an {} programming language!".format(word)) # Python is an awesome programming language! string.Template
